channel.title: Value of .357 Magnum Ammo Box and Crossbow Clip
channel.description:
[font='Times New Roman, Times, serif']Greetings. I'm making a small mod for slight difficulty rebalance for Black Mesa. Nothing serious: I just want to make few changes in skill.cfg (...\Black Mesa\bms\cfg). However, I can't modify amount of received ammo from .357 Magnum ammo box (6 rounds for Colt Python) and from crossbow clip (5 rounds for Crossbow). I have tried several different commands: [/size][/font][font='Times New Roman, Times, serif'][b]sk_item_ammo_357_pickup"6"[/b] [/size][/font][font='Times New Roman, Times, serif'][b]sk_item_"ammo_357""_pickup" 6[/b] [/size][/font][font='Times New Roman, Times, serif'][b]sk_item_ammo_357_value “6”[/b] [/size][/font][font='Times New Roman, Times, serif'][b]sk_item_ammo_crossbow_pickup "5"[/b] [/size][/font][font='Times New Roman, Times, serif'][b]sk_item_"ammo_crossbow""_pickup" 5[/b] [/size][/font][font='Times New Roman, Times, serif'][b]sk_item_ammo_crossbow_value “5”[/b] and ect. But, as you can quess, nothing worked. Direct input in console also not solved this problem, just issued an error "Unknown command". Does someone know how to change pickup variables for .357 ammo box and crossbow clip?
[/size][/font]

item.title: Value of .357 Magnum Ammo Box and Crossbow Clip
item.dc:creator: lambdaman
item.description:
I tried doing something like this before, but I’m pretty sure you can’t change the values, sorry.
In the future you might get commands to change this, but not now.

Read full topic
item.source: Value of .357 Magnum Ammo Box and Crossbow Clip

item.title: Value of .357 Magnum Ammo Box and Crossbow Clip
item.dc:creator: Serious_Ash
item.description:
Admiral Sakai:

What’s with the quotation marks?

Just a result of copy-paste from my list of commands for BM. Maybe I have used quotation marks from cyrillic keyboard and they loocks like that “5”. But they dosen’t affect on console input.[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Value of .357 Magnum Ammo Box and Crossbow Clip
item.dc:creator: Serious_Ash
item.description:
Greetings. I’m making a small mod for slight difficulty rebalance for Black Mesa. Nothing serious: I just want to make few changes in skill.cfg (…\Black Mesa\bms\cfg). However, I can’t modify amount of received ammo from .357 Magnum ammo box (6 rounds for Colt Python) and from crossbow clip (5 rounds for Crossbow). I have tried several different commands:
[/size]sk_item_ammo_357_pickup"6"
[/size]sk_item_“ammo_357"”_pickup" 6
[/size]sk_item_ammo_357_value “6”
[/size]sk_item_ammo_crossbow_pickup “5”
[/size]sk_item_“ammo_crossbow”"_pickup" 5
[/size][font=‘Times New Roman, Times, serif’]sk_item_ammo_crossbow_value “5”
and ect.
But, as you can quess, nothing worked. Direct input in console also not solved this problem, just issued an error “Unknown command”.
Does someone know how to change pickup variables for .357 ammo box and crossbow clip?

[/size][/font]

Read full topic
item.source: Value of .357 Magnum Ammo Box and Crossbow Clip
